job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtA Little About This GigltstronggtltpgtltpgtYou would be working with a forwardthinking team merging innovation and technology In this role you willltpgtltulgtltligtStrike a balance between critical thinking and actual handson analysesltligtltligtStitch and calibrate sparse and noisy data across various data sourcesltligtltligtUndertake preprocessing of structured and unstructured dataltligtltligtAnalyze large amounts of information to discover trends and patternsltligtltligtBuild predictive models and machinelearning algorithmsltligtltligtPresent information using data visualization techniquesltligtltligtApply statistics techniques to improve our experimentation platform and processltligtltligtPropose solutions and strategies to business challengesltligtltligtCollaborate with engineering and product development teamsltligtltligtDeliver on timeline commitments where necessaryltligtltligtBuild trust and strong relationships at all levelsltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtThe Perfect CandidateltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtThe ideal candidate will be intricately involved in running analytical experiments in a methodical manner and will regularly evaluate alternate models via theoretical approachesltligtltligt5 years of experience is REQUIREDltligtltligtPrior data science experience preferably in an engineering or technology roleltligtltligtStrong Quantitative background Masters expected PhD preferredltligtltligtFamiliarity with common analysis tools SQL and Jupyter are preferredltligtltligtProgramming chops demonstrable familiarity work experience Github account with programming concepts Python skills a plusltligtltligtResearch mindset ability to structure a project from idea to experimentation to prototype to implementationltligtltligtltugtltugtltstronggtltugtPlease link your KaggleGithub in your applicationltugtltstronggtltligtltulgt
